item.title: üí∞ Finance
item.description:
The Tr√§welling Team pays all expenses out of private pocket. We do not accept donations and have no income.

TL;DR: We pay about 16,56 ‚Ç¨ per month to run Tr√§welling.

Tr√§welling itself runs on a server hosted by Netcup in Nuremberg, Germany.

Server

  • 10 vCores
  • 12 GB RAM
  • Location: Nuremberg, Germany
  • 480 GB SSD (RAID10)

Costs: 13,59 ‚Ç¨ per month

Monitoring

Our Grafana dashboard runs on a private server that is ‚Äúalready‚Äù used for Grafana.

item.title: Events
item.description:
When you check in to public transport journeys, you can also check in to events if, for example, you are on your way to or from them. On traewelling.de/events you can find a list of events that are listed with us. If there is an event missing that you would like to check in to, you can also submit a suggestion on the page.

Criteria for events

Since we can’t and don’t want to accept every festival, demonstration, fair or whatever, events should meet a few criteria in order for us to list them on Tr√§welling. These are not 100% binding. The Tr√§welling Team reserves the right to use their own discretion to decide whether to accept or reject events. However, there are a few pro and con criteria that influence the decision.

item.title: üì± Apps
item.description:
Unfortunately, Tr√§welling itself does not currently offer any apps. The only official way to use Tr√§welling at the moment is through the website traewelling.de. All other sites or apps that allow you to interact with Tr√§welling are not official developments from us.

Third-party apps

Tr√§welling offers a free API that allows third-party developers to communicate with the service. A list of all (known) projects can be found here.

Authorization

Please note that if you use third-party apps, we no longer have any control over your data usage. If you delete your account with us, the data may continue to exist with third-party providers without us being able to change anything. Please think carefully about which apps you want to give access to your data!

item.title: ü©π Sticker
item.description:
Unfortunately we currently no longer have any stickers in stock. :c

We have printed stickers for the community. As long as the stock lasts, we can send you some by mail.

Please send us an e-mail to sticker@traewelling.de with your address and a digital a digital stamp for a standard letter. We finance Tr√§welling from private pockets and therefore unfortunately cannot buy stamps for you.

You can buy a digital stamp in the Deutsche Post / DHL app, for example. It starts with “#PORTO” followed by a code.

item.title: Projects by third parties
item.description:
Tr√§welling offers a free API that allows third-party applications to interact with Tr√§welling. On this page we collect open source projects that either interact with Tr√§welling or even represent an alternative to Tr√§welling.

Alternative projects

Projekt Link Infos
Travelynx http://travelynx.de/ Travelynx is a separate, independent check-in service.

Third-party projects

Websites

Project Link Status Infos
Aboard https://github.com/sunrisesdev/aboard public Aboard is an alternative web client for Tr√§welling, which focuses on mobile operation.

Apps

Project Platform Link(s) Status Infos
Tr√§welldroid Android https://traewelldroid.de/ / Google Play Store public Tr√§welldroid is an Android app that allows you to check in and interact with Tr√§welling natively on Android.

Scripts, Exporters and other tools

Project Link Infos
traewelling-exporter https://github.com/NyCodeGHG/traewelling-exporter Prometheus Exporter for journeys
traewelling-telegram-notificationsPublic https://github.com/HerrLevin/traewelling-telegram-notifications No description, website, or topics provided.
traewelling-dashboard-rss https://github.com/AdriDevelopsThings/traewelling-dashboard-rss Create a RSS feed from your traewelling dashboard
traewelling-widget https://github.com/tiuub/traewelling-widget An iOS widget for Tr√§welling
